item.title: Python and R
item.description: R Hey everybody welcome to my first blog post. Today I wanted to talk about two coding languages that I learned over the course of this semester. The first one that I learned was R, and it is tremendously useful for data analysis and organizing large sets of data for research. You can check out an awesome example of the power of R through my two projects that you can find by navigating to the projects section of my site or by clicking the links below.
